meanings.definition: Not decreasing or diminishing in intensity or strength.
meanings.sent1: Her enthusiasm for painting was unwaning.
meanings.sent2: The unwaning support of her friends kept her going.
meanings.sent3: The unwaning energy of the puppy was both adorable and exhausting.
meanings.sent4: His unwaning determination was a beacon of inspiration for the team.
meanings.sent5: The unwaning sunlight filled the room with a warm glow.

meanings.definition: Continuing without becoming weaker or less intense.
meanings.sent1: The unwaning excitement of the crowd could be felt in the air.
meanings.sent2: Her unwaning smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: The unwaning chatter of the birds outside made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent4: The unwaning applause echoed through the auditorium.
meanings.sent5: His unwaning curiosity led him to explore new places.
